ScenarioDef.label: Lion Kind
ScenarioDef.description: Lying under the sun, surrounded by your pride. Your a newborn cub, future king of the Sahara. In the night, poachers arrive. Your father sacrifices himself, so you can make your escape. All alone now, will you rise as a king, or fall...
